newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spanish foreign minister suffers mild heart attack.
newsitem.headline: Spanish foreign minister suffers mild heart attack.

text.p: Spanish Foreign Minister Abel Matutes suffered a mild heart attack on the Mediterranean holiday island of Ibiza on Saturday. Doctors described his condition as serious but stable.
A hospital statement said Matutes was admitted with chest pains in the early hours of the morning and suffered a heart attack of "small magnitude" while in intensive care.
Local news reports said Matutes had been on vacation.
The hospital said it would issue an update on his condition midday on Sunday. 291814 GMT mar 97
